explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a deep learning model for patent quality valuation, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The paper explicitly mentions using deep learning models (DLPQV) for patent valuation.
explanations.representation learning: The model learns patent embeddings from citation networks and attributes, which involves representation learning.
explanations.neural network: The proposed model includes neural network components (ACNN).
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper uses an Attention-based Convolutional Neural Network (ACNN) to extract semantic representations from patent text.
explanations.CNN: ACNN is a type of Convolutional Neural Network (CNN).
explanations.attention mechanism: The model uses an Attention-based Convolutional Neural Network, which incorporates attention mechanisms.
